member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.GravityMultiplier
member.summary: The value by which Physics.gravity is multiplied.

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.Speed
member.summary: The speed of the projectile in m/s.

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.LayerMask
member.summary: The layer mask that is applied to the projectile's collisions.

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.PenetrationEnabled
member.summary: Whether the projectile should be able to penetrate objects.

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.Penetration
member.summary: The maximum thickness the projectile can penetrate in mm. (inclusive)

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.RicochetEnabled
member.summary: Whether the projectile should bounce off of surfaces.

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.RicochetAngle
member.summary: The maximum angle at which a ricochet can occur. (inclusive)

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.IgnoreDestroy
member.summary: Debug lines will keep rendering after the proectile is destroyed.

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.PathColor
member.summary: The color path lines will be drawn

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.NormalColor
member.summary: The color normals will be drawn

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.PenetrationColor
member.summary: The color the path through an object is drawn

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.UpdateLoop
member.summary: The update loop that the projectile is running in.

member.name: P:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.Velocity
member.summary: The velocity vector of the projectile.

member.name: M:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.OnPenetrationEnter(UnityEngine.RaycastHit,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Called when the projectile sucssesfully penetrates an object.
member.param: The RaycastHit of when the projectile entered the object.
The velocity at which the projectile struck the object.
The reletive thickness of the object.

member.name: M:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.OnPenetrationExit(UnityEngine.RaycastHit,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Called when the projectile exits a penetrated object
member.param: The RacastHit of when the projectile exited the object.
The velocity at which the projectile exited the object.
The reletive thickness of the object.

member.name: M:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.OnPenetrationFailed(UnityEngine.RaycastHit,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Called when the Projectile fails to penetrate an object. if penetration is disabled, this will always be called upon collision.
member.param: The RaycastHit of the collision with the object.
The velocity at which the projectile struck the object.
The thickness of the struck object.

member.name: M:ArtemisProjectile.ProjectileController.OnRicochet(UnityEngine.RaycastHit,System.Single,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Called when the projectile ricochets off of an object
member.param: The RaycastHit of the contact with the surface
The angle that the projectile hit the surface.
The velocity the projectile hit the surface.
The velocity of the projectile after reflection.
